title: Nod to DS Group offer for Viceroy Bangalore Hotels
description: The hospitality company owns the Marriott-managed five-star Renaissance Bengaluru Race Course Hotel, and has around ₹1,100 crore of unpaid debt. The New Delhi-based acquirer has proposed ₹300 crore to buy the company in a court-monitored insolvency resolution process.
